page.title: 07SERVICES NOW, GRAINTHORPE
page.content: Several diverse and enterprising small family businesses can be found,and it is interesting to note that 13 out of 16 had/have children at the primary school,and are not native to the village. The newest, using science and technology is Vergeplan Ltd.which began operating in early 1985 as a specialised supplier of all facets of inspection and testing to the engineering industry using, Radiography,Ultrasonic,Magnetic particle & Liquid Penetrant non-destructive testing equipment. A full range of processes entailing the destructive testing of items is also available. The service with the longest continuity is that of Chimney sweep. See pages 3,4 & 5,Employment for a full range.
